comment: Prof. Cantrell had a mostly lecture only class with great, informing, and thorough lectures, you learn a lot. 2 tests with your notes but lockdown/webcam, open note quizzes, and a easy graded project, he is a good guy who will chat and cares. BUT he is phone crazy for some reason, and you NEED to participate/pay attention or he gets kinda upset.

Take him! Genuinely a great guy who cares about everyone in his class. Amazing professor who is great at lecturing and teaching the content. Always came prepared with detailed PowerPoints and the occasional primary source reading. Open note quizzes and tests, with the tests being lockdown+webcam. Attendance mandatory, crazy when it comes to phones.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: An amazing teacher; it's clear he cares about helping students learn. All tests are open-note; as long as you participate in class, it's an easy A. I definitely learned a lot this year.

It's evident he loves history, which leads to lecture-heavy classes. However, his lectures were engaging and correlated with the PowerPoint he presents in class. He's really open to in-class participation and class discussions, which were very insightful. If you take notes, attend the lectures, or listen to the lectures online, you'll do great!

Good professor — he really does love talking about history. I was fully online, so he uploaded lectures every week. They were necessary to watch for the midterm and final exams. For the exams, there's a writing portion where your paragraphs need to be very detailed. They're open-note, and the exams are proctored with a webcam in lockdown mode.

I would say he's a very easy grader. If you're interested in a History class, he was not that engaging. Lessons were very long, and he talks for REALLY long. It gets boring. Other than that, he didn't make his class difficult. You could only miss class three times. Two exams and one project, each are 25% of grade.

This has to be one of the best professors I've ever had. He cares about his students' learning; his lectures are always fun and interesting. All tests are open note, so as long as you take notes and participate in the class, you will do great.

I am so bad at history, but this class was very easy! You can use all your notes on the exams (2 of them)  and there is no time limit which really helps. The lectures are informative and if you attend, you get the powerpoint emailed to you. The project is easy and the written portion of the tests are very free.

He's awesome at teaching it is very entertaining to listen to him you can tell he loves talking about history. His tests are lockdown browser open note-no time limit and he does have attendance count as a grade. There is a short 5 question no lockdown quiz on d2l every week and a easy project that doesn't require a in person presentation.

It's easy if you do the work. I'm currently taking this course, and the first midterm was easy. It had a written portion that had to be pretty long. It was a lockdown exam, but he did let us use notes. He's a history major, so he knows his stuff and likes discussion posts and essay portions of exams to be in great detail.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Cantrell is a very understanding person. For the class, there is a free online textbook and 2 lectures each week. There are weekly quizzes and biweekly discussions posts. The exams are lockdown browser webcam but open note. If you are struggling in the class, contact him immediately. Overall, a very manageable class

He made our exams lockdown and webcam due to students cheating and taking advantage of his kindness. Since the change was in the middle of the semester he dropped our lowest discussion and 2 of the lowest quizzes. And gave a makeup opportunity to replace your lowest Exam grade. Very sweet accessible professor that cares for his students. TAKE HIM

This online course was definitely one of the best I've taken. Weekly quizzes and discussion posts don't take a lot of time to complete. 3 exams with an essay portion but various topics to choose from. He unfortunately had to make the exams lockdown and webcam due to cheating but still very manageable and easy content. Would 100% take him again

His 2112 class is enjoyable, taught well, and not arbitrarily difficult or filled with busywork. Graded by 3 exams (60% total), 7 discussions, and a bunch of short quizzes. Exams have essay portions within. Offers recordings & transcript for lectures alongside the online book. Highly recommended if you want a straightforward online history class!

Professor Cantrell is GREAT!!!
You should definitely take him for US History 2112 class! Easy A as long as you do the work each week.  He sends out weekly reminders on what is due each week.  He gives you plenty of time (2-3 days) to take his 3 Exams online .  He is a great professor and I would highly recommend him for taking US History!

Take him! Every week he reminds his students what is due. His online class is VERY easy to follow. There's a live lecture once a week for online students. There are quizzes, but there all based upon the textbook (that is free). There are 3 exams w/ 1 essay (each) that are easy to do if you review the lectures. Discussion boards are EASY & DIRECT.

TAKE HIM FOR US HISTORY! Guaranteed A+!!!! Easy quizzes no lockdown browser. Discussion posts are very simple and straightforward. Exams lockdown browser no camera but with essay portion. It's not bad just utilized online resources to help you write it. Overall great prof, def take him for finish another general course!

I am taking this class online, if you need an easy US history class because you do not care about the class I highly recommend him. The work is extremely easy with one discussion pots and quiz (unlimited attempts). It is quite writing heavy but better than any other US history class.

Professor Cantrell is a great professor to have if you can get him. He gives good lectures and his class is broken up between 4 main tests and a handful of online quizzes. Pay attention to lectures they are directly related to tests and quizzes. He makes history interesting to earn about and is a really good guy.
He's a fantastic teacher, and his grades are very fair. Make sure to take notes if you decide not to read the textbook.
Awesome teacher and easy to get credits. Definitely recommend.

Take this guys online history class if you can. It is super easy. All you have to do each week is one 250 word discussion and a 4 question quiz with unlimited attempts (not lockdown browser). You also have a midterm and a final. He is a very lenient grader, and I enjoyed taking his class.

Professor Cantrell was fantastic. He was super helpful with a loss in my family and continued to check in with me for the remainder of the semester. His work was simple enough. Watch the lectures, read the book, take a quiz, write a discussion. Not difficult at all and didnt hinder you from learning the material. I would absolutely take him again.
It was an easy class if you take notes on his lectures. Be ready for a lot of writting since most of our grades depends on the discussion posts and the midterm and final are both essays.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: If you want an easy class take this one!! Literally, a week consists of a discussion post and quiz. He's also not a harsh grader!! The best teacher I have ever had.
Very good professor! Responds to emails, doesn't assign a lot of homework, and is very clear with what he expects.

TAKE HIS CLASS!! He is so sweet and really just wants you to pass. Weekly quizzes and discussion posts but they are very easy and quizzes have unlimited attempts. Midterm and final are super easy and his lectures are very informative. 100% would take his class again, best professor Ive had so far!

This class was so easy it was literally a lecture take a quiz (Quizlet is your best friend) and then a discussion post. He does give back great feedback and the final is not difficult at all. I personally don't like history but he made It seem so much better
